entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
